title: Lets support the boys!
body:
I don't know about you guys but I am pretty excited about Chiefs going to Wildcard. We've never made it to worlds before and I feel like this is our best chance yet.

Something that comes up every time we do interviews for video content with the teams is how much the support means. The boys are reading the hashtag #IAMOCE as well as posts on their Facebook page (https://www.facebook.com/chiefsesc ).

So it would be cool if we posted some messages/pictures of support for them. They're over in Turkey practicing right now and Riot Ferlyn is going to make sure they see this thread.

The support from you all can make a real difference.

Here's our attempt - i'm sure you guys can do better :P

http://i.imgur.com/edVKtyq.jpg

replies.body: I can't get over your sign Atlus AHAHHAHAHAHAH

Was spectacular to watch The Chiefs take out the OPL Grand Final and it's going to be great to watch The Chiefs take out the IWCQ Grand Final!

We know you can do it boys, you got this.

Also remember you can find all the details for IWC here - http://oce.lolesports.com/content/iwcq-2015

Games are streamed on www.twitch.tv/riotgames2 and start at 7pm AEST on the 26th of August. First game is Chiefs vs Bangkok Titans!

GOOOO Chiefs!

And join the Facebook event page xD 
--> https://www.facebook.com/events/1495845844041658/

Go Chiefs!

Sincerely, 

~ An Unbiased Caster

How glorious would it be for OCE to win Worlds 2015?

Well lets see how Chiefs do in the Wildcards then.

There should be a competition for people showing their support for Chiefs with their own fan signs....

Ping @ littlemisscheeky

;)

[The competition is up!](https://www.facebook.com/events/1495845844041658/permalink/1498248650468044/)
Top 3 most creative signs will win the Chiefs' favourite skins :D
http://imgur.com/p4Nv1OB
lol the guy with the DO IT

"Don't let your dreams be dreams!"
https://youtu.be/5-sfG8BV8wU 
[Ultimate Remix]
I will be their sports bra and offer them fantastic support in competition
Viewing party at OCE pls if the boys make it to worlds!!

I watched them play last qualifiers, they seem to only have one strategy go hard and when DP found that out, they baited and countered them so hard, it was completely one sided. If the same thing happens this qualifiers, I don't expect them to go far.....
People won't support me in game but hey never mind that! There are people over here who need my apparent support _right_?
